description:
When you meet Maverick, you think "stud". Deep voice, tall, amazing body, and an air of confidence.
He's also got an infectious smile that will warm ya up.
Maverick's job keeps him in shape, and he says his build is just natural. Grrrrrr.
He's got a girlfriend he is sweet on, and he mentioned about five times he was straight and no gay monkey business was in the future. Oh well.
But check him out, this boy is HOT and he sure can cum!
title: Maverick - Solo
